user_query: I'm planning a vacation to an exotic destination and I want to explore the local culture and attractions. Can you provide me with trending images of the location? Additionally, I would like to search for relevant images of traditional food and landmarks. Lastly, I need to know the languages spoken in that country and their transliteration scripts.

TaskList.description: Search for trending images of the exotic destination.
Search for images of traditional food related to the destination.
Search for images of landmarks in the destination.
Retrieve information about languages spoken in the destination country and their transliteration scripts.
